channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dip / trench across road, 18th October
item.description:
Dip / crack forming in carriageway, extending across road from kerb - car jolts as you drive over it - needs repairing please. Photo shows exact location.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmoreland Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 18th October
item.description:
Car smashed wing mirror and front. No tax and no MOT. Unsafe kids playing around street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Larkfield Road, Longlands, London

item.title: On the corner of Bridewain Street and Grange Walk, 18th October
item.description:
There was something made of glass on the road and a car ran over it and the glass smashed into lots of small pieces and now there is glass everywhere and the cars are moving the glass around

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Grange Walk, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: Lamp post no operational, 18th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seaton Road, East Wickham, London

item.title: Recycling bin stolen, 18th October
item.description:
My recycling bin (clearly marked 19, as I live at 19 Bonfield Road) has been stolen on the night it was put out for the binmen. A neighbour of mine caught the thief walking towards Clarendon Rise on her security camera. I have looked in vain for it all over the surrounding streets. Please could you replace it. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Bonfield Road, Hither Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering and urinating around entrance to the building, 18th October
item.description:
This alleyway leading to the only entrance on residents in Agate House is full of rubbish and cigarette butts. People use it to urinate, especially on Fri and Sat nights, and the whole area stinks. Can you please fix this?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wallis Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees urgently need pollarding, 18th October
item.description:
The trees on the riverfront are overgrown, with roots causing the upturning of paving tiles, and the canopies are restricting light into the adjacent building.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hoskins Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to verge and tree, 18th October
item.description:
Owners at 22 Lyndhurst Road, Barnehurst builders have damaged the tree (base) and destroyed the glass verge. Can the repairs be made and the owners responsible pay for the damage?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyndhurst Road, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Fly tipping and littering nor being dealt with, 18th October
item.description:
On the pavement and on the front forecourt of the BA exchange. Drinkers and anti social behaviour. This whole area is a problem. Can’t somebody from Hackney contact BT about this?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Green, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
